channel.title: KaijuKage Powerz
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "KaijuKage Powerz" - Discussion about functionality

item.title: Re: KaijuKage Powerz
item.content:encoded:
This is part of the Immortal Realm. I will update the wiki if it wasn't already.
Also, it costs 250 stamina to create 1 of the basic resource your village produces.

item.title: KaijuKage Powerz
item.content:encoded:
Kaiju Kage get 50% off costs. Is this part of the Immortal Realm, or part of being a KaijuKage? (read: the final countdown)
Also, same thing for Concentration of Power (which isn't on the wikiâ€¦(200 stamina for a basic resource))
